recipe.title: Warm Olives with Fennel and Orange
instructions: Place olives in medium bowl. Cover with 2 cups water; let stand 10 minutes. Drain. Combine olives, oil, thyme, garlic, fennel seeds, and orange peel in small skillet. Cook over medium-high heat until garlic is fragrant and oil is hot, about 5 minutes. Remove from heat. Stir in vinegar. Cool slightly; serve warm.
Place olives in medium bowl. Cover with 2 cups water; let stand 10 minutes. Drain.

Combine olives, oil, thyme, garlic, fennel seeds, and orange peel in small skillet. Cook over medium-high heat until garlic is fragrant and oil is hot, about 5 minutes. Remove from heat. Stir in vinegar. Cool slightly; serve warm.
